ImprintPage.introText: This imprint is provided in accordance with Section 5 of the German Telemedia Act (TMG) and other applicable laws.

section2.title: 2. Disclaimer
section2.description: Despite careful monitoring, I assume no liability for the content of external links. The content of linked pages is the sole responsibility of their operators.

section3.title: 3. Contact Me
section3.description: If you have any questions regarding this imprint or the information provided, feel free to contact me at:

PrivacyPolicyPage.introText: At Adrian Goerken ('I,' 'my,' 'me'), I am committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a safe online experience. This Privacy Policy outlines how I collect, use, and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (EU) 2016/679 and German data protection laws.

section2.title: 2. Website Hosting
section2.description: The website my generate standard server logs for technical purposes, which do not contain personally identifiable information.

section3.title: 3. Contact Me
section3.description: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or my data practices, please contact me at:

section4.title: 4. Legal Compliance
section4.description: This website complies with GDPR, EU, and German data protection regulations by not collecting personal data.
